application_title.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

application_description.message: Muestra el tiempo en múltiples lugares que se pueden establecer mediante la API de tiempo libre proporcionada por Yahoo (Yahoo Weather API).
application_description.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

warning_nolocation.description: Text to be displayed when no location is defined

action_setlocation.message: Haga clic aquí para crear una nueva ubicación!
action_setlocation.description: Text to be displayed when clicking on link to set location

warning_nodata.description: Text to be displayed when no data is available for a location

action_updatingsoon.description: Text to be displayed as a notification that data will be updated soon

label_weatherin.description: Label to be displayed as a prefix for the weather location

condition_mixed_rain_and_snow.message: La lluvia y la nieve mezclada
condition_mixed_rain_and_snow.description: Condition name for: Mixed rain and snow

condition_mixed_snow_and_sleet.description: Condition name for: Mixed snow and sleet

condition_mixed_rain_and_hail.description: Condition name for: Mixed rain and hail

condition_scattered_snow_showers.description: Condition name for: Scattered snow showers

condition_isolated_thundershowers.message: Lluvia aislada con truenos y relámpagos

action_refreshnow.message: Haga clic aquí para actualizar ahora!
action_refreshnow.description: Text to be displayed when clicking on link to refresh data

action_viewnextlocation.description: Text to be displayed when clicking to navigate to next location

action_viewprevlocation.description: Text to be displayed when clicking to navigate to previous location

popup_text_tiptoopen.description: Text to be dispayed in the popup page as a tip for quick open

popup_text_viewimage.description: Text to be dispayed in the popup in the link that opens the main background image details
